title: PM calls urgent meeting of economic experts
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 12 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday called an urgent meeting of economic experts to discuss the current financial challenges facing the country.
Chaired by PM Sharif, the meeting was attended by prominent economists and deliberated upon the ways and means to find a solution for financial stability.
The prime minister was given a briefing on the data on the national balance sheet and fiscal deficits.
Important decisions will be taken in line with the recommendations of the experts.
